title: Brad Venable, Prominent Video Game And Anime Voice Actor, Passes Away
summary:
Brad Venable, a prominent voice actor who played Griffon/Nightmare in Devil May Cry 5, has passed away at age 43.
According to IGN, no cause of death has been given at the time of publishing.
Venable’s lengthy voice acting credits included Final Fantasy VII Remake, 2020’s Demon’s Souls remake, Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War, Shenmue III, and Fire Emblem: Three Houses.
He also lended his vocal talents to anime such as Hero Mask (Lennox Gallagher), Dragon Ball Super (Shisami), Attack on Titan (Daz), and My Hero Academia.
The voice acting community has taken to social media share tributes to the late performer.
